messages.title: Telling the truth
messages.content: We have a revolutionary new approach to political campaigning, it's called: 'Telling the truth'

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Taking back control of our country
keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP want to take back control of our country.
UKIP plans to make Britain fairer with common sense policies, including investing in the NHS.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Ensuring those on the minimum wage do not pay income tax
keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP aims to ensure those on the minimum wage do not pay income tax.

leaflet.personalStatement: 42 year old businessman, husband & father of two.

images.caption: Martin Houlden UKIP Bournemouth West Parliamentary Candidate
